item.title: Re: Referral Points
item.content:encoded: You will not get referral points if you make a new character from an IP that already has characters playing on it. You get referral points once the person you referred gets to Chunin level. That generally takes a couple days to a week for new players.

item.title: Referral Points
item.content:encoded: Let's say you make a second and/or third account and type in your main's screen name to try and get a referral point for your main character; will that work once you reach the rank required to give that person a Referral Point? Also, how long exactly would it take for the average character to work there way up to the required rank for you to get the referral point?
